name: Crooked Staff
description: A crooked branch from a tree felled long ago, fashioned into a staff. You can feel a faint life force emanating from it, even now...

name: Rusted Blade

skill.name: Desperate Strike
skill.description: Attack the opponent with everything you have!

description: An old, rusted blade that was forged long ago. It has seen many battles...

name: Creaking Bow

skill.name: Piercing Shot
skill.description: Ignores a portion of enemy defense

description: An old bow fashioned out of oak. It has many grooves from years of use.
